synopsis.text: When Kiiko Kawakami, a seemingly ordinary girl with a hidden psychic ability to manipulate objects, crosses paths with the enigmatic Aaya Saitou, she finds herself inexplicably drawn to the new student. As their bond deepens into a romantic relationship, Kiiko revels in the sweet moments they share, from secret rendezvous to testing the limits of her powers. However, unbeknownst to Kiiko, Aaya harbors a secret that could shatter the very foundation of their love and trust. Will their romance withstand the storm that lies ahead, or will Aaya's hidden truth prove to be their undoing? Delve into the captivating tale of love, secrets, and psychic abilities in this enthralling anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
